name: Rover Motel
description:
Welcome to The Rover, Mackay, Queensland where we offer you the best in quality, comfortable, self-contained one and two bedroom accommodation. The Romeo Group owner operators and staff are dedicated to providing you with exceptional, friendly service ensuring you an enjoyable and comfortable stay.

The Rover is a 29 unit accommodation facility located close to the airport, hospital, sporting fields, shops and eateries. With rooms sleeping 1-5 people, we present a range of bed configurations as well as a playground, salt water swimming pool, grassed lawns and covered barbecue huts. A guest laundry is available on site and all units have 16 channels of Foxtel and undercover parking. We also provide open air parking for caravans, boats, trailers and high vehicles on a first in first served basis. Our rooms comfortably cater for the single traveller to large groups, for overnight, mid or long-term stays.

Conveniently located on the Nebo Road highway, Rover Units are within easy walking distance of dining, supermarket, hotel and medical facilities and just a short drive from a restaurants, Mackay Airport, Mackay Base Hospital, Mater Misericordiae Hospital and shopping at Mackay City Centre and Canelands Central. It's close to visitor points of interest like Mackay Regional Botanic Gardens, ArtSpace, The MECC, Canelands, Bluewater Quay, city centre, historical walks and more.

The Rover Policies and Conditions

- Cancellation policy: 24h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay.
- Check in from 14:00 to 21:00 .
- Check out from 08:00 to 10:00 .
- Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards. Please note that this property may authorise your card before arrival. 
- Taxes included.
- Breakfast not included.

General

- Reception: M-F 07:30 - 21:00; 
- Reception: Weekends 08:00 - 21:00
- No curfew.
- Child friendly.
- If you wish to check-in before 2.00pm or after 9.00pm, please call 49511888 to make arrangements.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms: Cancellation of booking within 2 weeks of the booked date and after the balance has been paid generates a penalty of $100 per room off the balance amount paid direct to the motel. Reduction in numbers doesn't generate a fee unless the total number of rooms reduces to less than 4 rooms in total. Reduction in numbers doesn't affect the room rate as the charge is by room, not by person. Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival and no-shows forfeit the first nights room charge for each room cancelled.
